member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_CRYPTO_SESSION_INPUT
member.summary: Contains input data for a D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_CRYPTO_SESSION command.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_CRYPTO_SESSION_INPUT.Parameters
member.summary: A structure that contains the command GUID and other data.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_CRYPTO_SESSION_INPUT.DecoderHandle
member.summary: A handle to the decoder device. Get this from .

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_CRYPTO_SESSION_INPUT.CryptoSessionHandle
member.summary: A handle to the cryptographic session. Get this from .

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_CRYPTO_SESSION_INPUT.DeviceHandle
member.summary: A handle to the Direct3D device. Get this from using D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_DEVICE_HANDLE.
